version_description: Global release of the 'Almost a Hero'

Hotfix Update
- Implemented prevention system for lost rewards if something goes wrong while watching an ad.
- Fixed: Artifacts will no longer have zero quality points.
- Minor balance tweaks on hero skills.
- Time Challenge #10 got easier.

• Mythical Artifacts! New kind of artifacts to unlock after stage 300.
• 35 New Quests in Adventure Mode.
• 3 New Merchant Items to boost your progress.
• 10 New Time Challenges: Enter the dream world and fight together with the illusions of your almost heroes.
• 6 New Runes for your rings. 2 per ring.
• Added more attributes for the artifacts
• Hero Balancing - Lots of fine-tuning for hero skills.
• Several bug fixes including Free Chest & Cloud save features.
• The Quality of Life Improvements:
   - Tap & Hold to upgrade your heroes faster.
   - Distribute the skill points faster.

• A new Almost Hero: Handsum Jim!
• Balancing: fine-tuning some hero skills.
• Several bug fixes.
• Some Quality of Life improvements.
• New languages: Simplified Chinese, Japanese and Korean.

• Brand new Earth Ring with 8 Runes.
• Shiny new Mythical Artifact Icons.
• Two new Mythical Artifacts:
   - Shiny Object (High QP)
   - Lazy Finger (Auto-upgrading)
• Overall balancing improvements (affecting artifacts, mythstone drops, heroes, revive durations, gold bag, etc.)
• Several bug fixes.

• Hotfix for iOS 8
• Brand new Earth Ring with 8 Runes.
• Shiny new Mythical Artifact Icons.
• Two new Mythical Artifacts:
   - Shiny Object (High QP)
   - Lazy Finger (Auto-upgrading)
• Overall balancing improvements (affecting artifacts, mythstone drops, heroes, revive durations, gold bag, etc.)
• Several bug fixes.

• A new Almost Hero: Tam!
• New mythical evolve level for heroes and their items.
• Additional levels for mythical artifacts.
• Compass can now be disabled.
• Overall balancing improvements.
• Improved integration with Game Center
• Several bug fixes.

• A new Almost Hero: Tam!
• New mythical evolve level for heroes and their items.
• Additional levels for mythical artifacts.
• Compass can now be disabled.
• Overall balancing improvements.
• Improved integration with Game Center.
• Several bug fixes.
• Hotfix for Chinese Localization Crash.

• Several bug fixes.
• A new Almost Hero: Tam!
• New mythical evolve level for heroes and their items.
• Additional levels for mythical artifacts.
• Compass can now be disabled.
• Overall balancing improvements.
• Improved integration with Game Center.

• Introducing: TRINKETS! You can now collect upgradable trinkets and choose which (almost a) hero deserves to equip them to boost your stats even more.
• Updated Shop, including some special timed offers.
• Achievements now feel much more rewarding: you can check them in-game, and completing them rewards you with gems! 
• 3 New Mythical Artifacts.
• New Quests in Adventure Mode (until stage 900!).
• Some Quality of Life improvements.
• Several bug fixes.
• You can find more info in our subreddit https://www.reddit.com/r/AlmostAHero/

• New: MINES! Unlock mines to get permanent bonuses, tokens and scraps! Get the shovel ready! 
• You'll also receive SIDE QUESTS that reward Aeon, a new currency. A new quest appears every 8 hours.
• Aeon can be used to buy trinkets or improve the mines. 
• Additional levels for your mythical artifacts!
• Gorgeous new backgrounds.
• Full game optimization.
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.

• New: MINES! Unlock mines to get permanent bonuses, tokens and scraps! Get the shovel ready! 
• You'll also receive SIDE QUESTS that reward Aeon, a new currency. A new quest appears every 8 hours.
• Aeon can be used to buy trinkets or improve the mines. 
• Additional levels for your mythical artifacts!
• Gorgeous new backgrounds.
• Full game optimization.
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.

• The holiday season is coming to Almost a Hero with new special offers and surprises here and there.
• New side quests! Also, you can skip the ones that you don't like! (for a price)
• Animated backgrounds & UI improvements.
• Optimized tutorial.
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.

• 2 new almost heroes: you’ll unlock Redroh the hoarding goblin at stage 440 and Uno the selfish warlock at stage 518. Careful, they’re not used to being good!
• 3 new runes that give amazing powers to your rings.
• 4 new side quests.
• 10 new trinket effects.
• New Adventure mode quests, up to stage 1000!
• Balancing changes to boost less used heroes.

• Celebrate our 1-year anniversary, there are gifts for everybody!
• Hero Outfits: choose the look that you like best for your almost heroes. Pick a classic one, or dress them up in one of our 26 special outfits! 
• 3 new Mythical Artifacts.
• 2 new Achievements, meaning more gems to collect!
• Improved Artifact UI.
• +5 levels for the Mines.
• You can find more info here http://bit.ly/aah2notes

• More Hero Outfits: one extra outfit per hero, 13 in total!
• Advanced options: customize your game with cooldown bars, notifications and more.
• New prestige screen: compare your run to the previous one!
• Lazy finger purchases milestone upgrades after lvl 91
• 6 new artifact bonuses!
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.
• You can find more info here http://bit.ly/aah21notes

• Test your skill and try to survive in a full new game mode: Gates of Gog!
• 80 gates with strange effects that make fights crazier than ever! 
• Collect charms & improve them to win!
• Earn more Aeon than ever!
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.
• You can find more info here: http://bit.ly/aah22notes

• Beat Gate 20 to unlock Cursed Gates: harder challenges that reward scraps!
• 40 new Gates.
• Dangerous boss fight at Gate 100.
• New flash offers that change daily.
• New mine levels!
• New artifact and charm sorting options to better manage your progress.
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.
• You can find more info here: http://bit.ly/aah23notes

• New hero: Nanna is here to heal the team with her NomNom broth! Get to stage 480 to unlock her.
• Better trinkets screen: star, sort and quickly see all your trinkets!
• 8 more trinket slots.
• Random skill picker in Adventure Mode (unlocks at stage 381).
• New merchant item for GoG mode: Auto Picker.
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.
• You can find more info here: http://bit.ly/aah24notes

• Halloween is here with new special offers and side quests!
• 5 new spooky outfits for your almost heroes.
• The whole game has dressed up for the occasion! Even the dragon!
• Better experience for big screens.
• QoL and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here http://bit.ly/aah25notes

• Halloween is here with new special offers and side quests!
• 5 new spooky outfits for your almost heroes.
• The whole game has dressed up for the occasion! Even the dragon!
• Better experience for big screens.
• QoL and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here http://bit.ly/aah25notes

• New spooky event: Trick or Treat!
• Catch dragons to collect candies, but beware, they will also give a bonus to make progress easier… or a negative effect to make things harder!
• Use your candies to get exclusive rewards and dress your heroes in Halloween Outfits!
• Improved cloud save
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here: http://bit.ly/aah360notes

• Summer event: catch summer dragons to get amazing bonuses! 
• 50 new Gates of Gog, and a new boss fight!
• 3 new powerful charms and 3 new curses!
• Complete Gates of Gog rework: get more aeon than ever!
• New summer outfits!
• QoL and bug fixes
• Read the patch notes here: http://bit.ly/aah32notes

• Several hero buffs for Arbara, Uno, Boomer and Nanna.
• QoL improvements and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here: http://bit.ly/aah350notes

• New hero: reach stage 1050 to unlock Arbara, the Fire Mage Tree!
• Extended summer event: dragons will offer powerful boosts for a little longer, get them while you can!
• Two new mythical artifacts.
• New artifact unique bonuses.
• New bosses!
• QoL and bug fixes
• Read the patch notes here: http://bit.ly/aah333notes

• New hero: reach stage 1050 to unlock Arbara, the Fire Mage Tree!

• New ring at stage 1440: Darkness Ring!
• Two new mythical artifacts and a new max stage!
• You can now earn mythstones while offline
• Reach the endgame and obtain fame points!
• QoL and bug fixes
• Read the patch notes here: http://bit.ly/aah31notes

• New alchemy system! Level up and evolve your artifacts to get unique bonuses.
• 3 new mythical artifacts.
• Adventure mode rework: new quests and a new max stage! (3200)
• 2 year anniversary event: outfits, gifts and more!
• Balance changes to trinkets and heroes.
• QoL and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here: http://bit.ly/aah30notes

• Join the seasonal event: Wintertide is upon us!
• Collect candies and exchange them for gifts, like new items and 7 new outfits!
• New special boss: the Terrifying Winter Man!
• More levels for your mythical artifacts.
• QoL, balance changes and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here http://bit.ly/aah28notes

• Better experience for big screens.

• Read the patch notes here http://bit.ly/aah25notes

• Share your team and your highest stage, or check your player stats!
• Ghost heroes have appeared in the Gates of Gog!
• Explore the heroes’ skills before hiring them.
• Improved interface for trinkets and side quests.
• QoL and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here http://bit.ly/aah29notes

• New hero: get to stage 632 to unlock Ron, the messy shapeshifter! 
• New feature: trinket forging! Create the trinkets you want from spare parts once you reach stage 500 & level them up immediately.
• 9 more Curses for the Gates of Gog.
• More quests for Adventure Mode, up to stage 1200!
• QoL, balance changes and bug fixes.
• Read the patch notes here http://bit.ly/aah26notes
